Class RowClearAnimator

java.lang.Object
com.comp2042.tetris.view.RowClearAnimator
public class RowClearAnimator extends Object
Handles row clearing animations for the Tetris game. Animates cleared rows with a fade-out and scale effect before they are removed.

  • Method Details

    • animateClearRows

      public void animateClearRows(javafx.scene.layout.GridPane gamePanel, List<Integer> clearedRowIndices, Runnable onComplete)
      Animates the clearing of rows on the game board.
      Parameters:
      gamePanel - The GridPane containing the game board rectangles
      clearedRowIndices - List of row indices that were cleared (in board coordinates)
      onComplete - Callback to execute after the animation completes

    • collectRectanglesFromRows

      private List<javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle> collectRectanglesFromRows(javafx.scene.layout.GridPane gamePanel, List<Integer> clearedRowIndices)
      Collects all Rectangle nodes from the specified rows in the GridPane.
      Parameters:
      gamePanel - The GridPane containing the rectangles
      clearedRowIndices - List of row indices (in board coordinates, accounting for hidden rows)
      Returns:
      List of Rectangle nodes to animate

    • animateClearRowsWithFlash

      public void animateClearRowsWithFlash(javafx.scene.layout.GridPane gamePanel, List<Integer> clearedRowIndices, Runnable onComplete)
      Creates a more elaborate animation with a flash effect before fade out.
      Parameters:
      gamePanel - The GridPane containing the game board rectangles
      clearedRowIndices - List of row indices that were cleared
      onComplete - Callback to execute after the animation completes

    • triggerRowExplosions

      private void triggerRowExplosions(javafx.scene.layout.GridPane gamePanel, List<Integer> clearedRowIndices)
      Triggers pixel star explosion effects along the cleared rows.
      Parameters:
      gamePanel - The GridPane containing the game board
      clearedRowIndices - List of row indices that were cleared
